title: How to Leave a Blood and Dust Trail on Tiles in Unity For Beginners - Super Meat Boy Blood Effects

media:group.media:title: How to Leave a Blood and Dust Trail on Tiles in Unity For Beginners - Super Meat Boy Blood Effects

Hi guys, in todays video we will recreate some of the bloody effects in super meat boy using Unity! I hope you enjoy!
